A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm a super fan... just shy of cosplay. Loved it! Great movie to bring in tge generations\, and to prooel the not-so-simple-as-light-and-dark story and themes. my biggest gauge for its success is that the whole family of 5 went\, and everyone - from 5 to 42 - loved (or at least liked) it. There will be some things that the uber-fan won't love\, and it's not a perfect movie (there were a couple cringeworthy moments)\, but it's what I think a Star Wars movie in the 21st century should be.
